channel.title: ~~~ CastleScape™ ~~~ V4!, *!Recruiting!* New Staff, New Source
channel.description:
hey, im Chrisz..
i made castlescape v1,v2,v3 And about to make v4!
BUT, i wnna start with a new source, (from scratch) and i want a team to code,, Well.. if u wnna help,
then join our forums! and apply,
[b]V3:[/b] [shadow=black,left]lllllllllllllllllll[/shadow]
[b]CastleWarz[/b] [shadow=black,left]lllllllllllllllllll[/shadow]
[b]Skillcape,shops (with real ones)[/b] [shadow=black,left]lllllllllllllllllll[/shadow]
[b]quests[/b] [shadow=black,left]lllllllllllllllllll[/shadow]
[b]quests, mage spells, commands, etc.[/b] [shadow=black,left]lllllllllllllllllll[/shadow]
Well check my sig for the forums
